modules.title: Types of Semiconductor Companies
modules.description: Detailed examination of the various types of companies within the semiconductor industry.

sections.title: Integrated Device Manufacturers (IDMs)
sections.description: Companies that handle the entire production process, from design to manufacturing.

sections.title: Fabless Companies
sections.description: Companies that design chips but outsource manufacturing to foundries.

sections.title: Foundries
sections.description: Companies specialized in manufacturing semiconductors for fabless companies.

sections.title: Equipment Suppliers
sections.description: Companies that supply the machinery and tools needed for chip manufacturing.

sections.title: Material Suppliers
sections.description: Companies providing the raw materials necessary for semiconductor production.
